channel.title: ?Adding shops?
channel.description:
[quote="Hey*"]Gud but how do I know where is the shop? Do i have to put in some coords?
Do I need to change PutNPCCoords to some coords? Do i replade PutNPCCoords with 3054 2159 or wut??
[code] } else if ((NPCID == 531) || (NPCID == 530)) { // Shop Keeper + Assistant 3054 2159 = true; WanneShop = 15; // Rimmington General Store[/code]
???
Explain pls. I want my shopkeeper to be in edge general store ... (the coords are wrong, i know [they are example]).[/quote]
